cases.title: Login
cases.preconditions: access to web application IKEA, username & password

steps.action: Open Sign In page
steps.expected_result: Sign In page of web application IKEA is open

steps.action: Enter email and password, click on "continue" button
steps.expected_result: Login with success, account page is open

cases.title: Login with wrong email format
cases.preconditions: access to web application IKEA, username & password

steps.action: Open Sign In page
steps.expected_result: Sign In page of web application IKEA is open

steps.action: Enter email and password, click on "continue" button
steps.expected_result: Login without success, pop-up message with "Invalid email used" is displayed.

cases.title: Login with wrong password
cases.preconditions: access to web application IKEA, username & password

steps.action: Open Sign In page
steps.expected_result: Sign In page of web application IKEA is open

steps.action: Enter email and password, click on "continue" button
steps.expected_result: Login not possible

cases.title: Testing the flow of purchasing a product
cases.preconditions: username & password, access to web application IKEA, having a valid debit/credit card

steps.action: Open Sign In page
steps.expected_result: Sign In page of web application IKEA is open

steps.action: Enter email and password, click on "continue" button
steps.expected_result: Login with success, account page is open

steps.action: Click on "Menu" page button
steps.expected_result: Pop-up window with Menu is open

steps.action: Click on "Products"
steps.expected_result: Pop-up window with Products categories is open

steps.action: Click on "Beds" category
steps.expected_result: New page with selected category is open. Al products are display with picture, name, short description, price, rating and color variants.

steps.action: Click on product "MALM" bed. Select color and dimension.
steps.expected_result: New page with more details is open for selected product. The product on selected color is highlighted and the selected dimension is displayed from the drop-down list.

steps.action: Click "Add in cart" button. Click "continue to shopping cart".
steps.expected_result: Pop-up with success message: "MALM" bed has been added. The shopping cart page is open, price and number of products is displayed.

steps.action: Click on " go to checkout".
steps.expected_result: New page for personal data fields and payment is open.

steps.action: Fill in the name/address/phone no./email and choose payment method cash on delivery/card.
steps.expected_result: New page for online payment is open.

steps.action: Fill in the payment info: name/card no./CVC code/ expire date
steps.expected_result: Pop-up with success message is displayed and a confirmation mail for the order is received.

cases.title: Testing the payment method with expired card
cases.preconditions: access to web application IKEA, having a debit card

steps.action: Open Sign In page, enter email/password
steps.expected_result: Sign In page of web application IKEA is open and login is working

steps.action: Click on sofa product category
steps.expected_result: New page with all products from sofa category is open

steps.action: Click "Add in cart" button for "KIVIK" sofa.
steps.expected_result: Pop-up with success message: "KIVIK" has been added in the shopping cart.

steps.action: Click on " show" on the pop-u message.
steps.expected_result: The shopping cart page is open.

steps.action: Click "go to checkout" button.
steps.expected_result: New page for personal data fields and payment is open.

steps.action: Fill in the name/address/phone no./email and choose payment method cash on delivery/card.
steps.expected_result: New page for online payment is open.

steps.action: Fill in the payment info: name/card no./CVC code/ expire date
steps.expected_result: Pop-up with expired card is displayed and the payment cannot be done.

cases.title: Testing the payment method with wrong data for card no./CVC code
cases.preconditions: access to web application IKEA, having a debit card

steps.action: Open Sign In page, enter email/password
steps.expected_result: Sign In page of web application IKEA is open and login is working

steps.action: Click on sofa product category
steps.expected_result: New page with all products from sofa category is open

steps.action: Click "Add in cart" button for "KIVIK" sofa.
steps.expected_result: Pop-up with success message: "KIVIK" has been added in the shopping cart.

steps.action: Click on " show" on the pop-u message.
steps.expected_result: The shopping cart page is open.

steps.action: Click "go to checkout" button.
steps.expected_result: New page for personal data fields and payment is open.

steps.action: Fill in the name/address/phone no./email and choose payment method cash on delivery/card.
steps.expected_result: New page for online payment is open.

steps.action: Fill in the payment info: name/card no./CVC code/ expire date
steps.expected_result: Pop-up with "wrong card information" is displayed and the payment cannot be done.

steps.action: Open Sign In page
steps.expected_result: Sign In page of web application IKEA is open

steps.action: Enter email and password, click on "continue" button
steps.expected_result: Login with success, account page is open

steps.action: Go to main page of web application IKEA
steps.expected_result: Main page is open

steps.action: Write in the search field the name of the product you are looking for
steps.expected_result: A new page with all desks is open

steps.action: Open Sign In page
steps.expected_result: Sign In page of web application IKEA is open

steps.action: Enter email and password, click on "continue" button
steps.expected_result: Login with success, account page is open

steps.action: Go to main page of web application IKEA
steps.expected_result: Main page is open

steps.action: Write in the search field the name of the product you are looking for
steps.expected_result: A new page with all desks is open

steps.action: Click on "all filters" button
steps.expected_result: Pop-up is open with all filters categories

steps.action: Select price/width/color filter
steps.expected_result: The application found 8 products with the selected criteria

cases.title: Testing the filter option for price

steps.action: Open Sign In page
steps.expected_result: Sign In page of web application IKEA is open

steps.action: Enter email and password, click on "continue" button
steps.expected_result: Login with success, account page is open

steps.action: Go to main page of web application IKEA
steps.expected_result: Main page is open

steps.action: Write in the search field the name of the product you are looking for
steps.expected_result: A new page with all desks is open

steps.action: Click on "price" button
steps.expected_result: Drop-down list with prices ranges is open

steps.action: Select the price range
steps.expected_result: The application display only desks with a price between 200 and 399,9 RON

cases.title: Testing the sort option by price

steps.action: Open Sign In page
steps.expected_result: Sign In page of web application IKEA is open

steps.action: Enter email and password, click on "continue" button
steps.expected_result: Login with success, account page is open

steps.action: Go to main page of web application IKEA
steps.expected_result: Main page is open

steps.action: Write in the search field the name of the product you are looking for
steps.expected_result: A new page with all desks is open

steps.action: Click on "sort" button
steps.expected_result: Drop-down list with sorting criteria is open

steps.action: Select the sort by price starting with the lowest
steps.expected_result: The application display all desks, sort from the cheapest one to the most expensive

cases.title: Testing the option of adding products to favorites
cases.preconditions: username & password, access to web application IKEA

steps.action: Open Sign In page
steps.expected_result: Sign In page of web application IKEA is open

steps.action: Enter email and password, click on "continue" button
steps.expected_result: Login with success, account page is open

steps.action: Click on "Menu" page button
steps.expected_result: Pop-up window with Menu is open

steps.action: Click on "Products"
steps.expected_result: Pop-up window with Products categories is open

steps.action: Click on "Beds" category
steps.expected_result: New page with selected category is open. Al products are display with picture, name, short description, price, rating and color variants.

steps.action: Click "add to favorite" button for product "MALM" bed.
steps.expected_result: Pop-up with success message: "MALM" bed has been added to favorite list.

steps.action: Click "show" button on the success message in order to go to favorite list
steps.expected_result: The Favorite list page is open and the selected product is in the list
